case.state: Flagship of the Shimakaze-class destroyers, Shimakaze!
Destroyer, Shimakaze! I'm the fastest, you know?
Rensouhou-chan! Don't wander too far away from the room, or you'll get lost again.
We'll have some races when we return to the base, okay, Rensouhou-chan?
Rensouhou-chan, don't get into any fights, okay?
Rensouhou-chan, even if someone makes you mad, you can't open fire on them.
I'll finish up as quick as a flash, Rensouhou-chan, so wait patiently outside.
I mean, he's kind of a robot, yeah. Wait outside, 'kay, Rensouhou-chan?
Refuel and reload!
Scrap these - I need new cards!
Dealer, you're so slow!
Could you refit this hand please?
Deal me another set!
Admi- Dealer! New cards!
Change my equi- cards, please!
Dealer, resupply, please!
Quick, run, Rensouhou-chan!
I'm not gonna be winning any races at this rate.
Aww, nothing's coming off this round!
I'll just have to find a way to catch up!
Already off to a bad start, huh?
I can't show off my speed with cards like these!
Oh! This hand is alright!
This might be enough!
Okay, maybe this time-!
I think this will go alright!
This hand should put me back in the race!
Can I catch up with this?
I'm gonna win this round, at least!
This is my chance to catch up!
I stalled at the start, but I'm catching up with this!
I feel like this is it!
Rensouhou-chan isn't a pod, he's a gun!
Tactical support? Is shooting Abyssals a tactic?
Oh, 9S! You have a little friend with you too?
Eh, 9S, your robot friend can wait in the audience? No one told me that!
Now you want to give up your hand, Aimee? Stop playing around!
You're making fun of me, Aimee! Play seriously!
You're using a different gun than normal, Aimee? I'd feel real bad for Rensouhou-chan if I did that!
Eh, ~player~, are you gonna do that? Play seriously!
Hey, ~player~, you can't just stop playing like that!
Ah, those hands! They're driving my sonars crazy! Elizabeth, what are those?
Hmm, plushie? Who, Rensouhou-chan? He's not a doll!
Robot's kinda close! Rensouhou-chan's a naval gun!
Oh, put the Kanmusu Ondo on! All shipgirls know how to sing it! ア ソレソレソレ！
I heard that there's music called "speedcore", which really sounds like my kinda thing. Not that I've ever listened to it.
Yeah, that's me! Although it's kind of strange you know the name "Kantai Collection"...
Therian? Is that a breed of rabbit, Jenetta?
Jura! You have really long and pretty hair! And it's blonde, too! Like mine!
You know, Jura? You remind me a little of Iowa as well. You're both, like, super mature, and you both make these really odd jokes...
Hey! Jura! You can't just snatch away Rensouhou-chan like that!
Hey! Jura! I know Rensouhou-chan is super cute, but you can't just take him like that!
Hey, Marinette, are you one of those 'superhero' people?
Oh, Marinette, I know! I should ask Richelieu to model for you! She's super tall, and super beautiful!
T-Tojiko? If she's important to you, Pr- Miko, then I'll remember her name!
...The Seven-Star Sword? The legendary one!? Pr- Miko! Incredible!
Crown Prince? Wait... Prince Shoutoku?! Y-y-your Majesty! If it is your command, then I will strive to call you Miko!
Soldier? I dunno if you can call me that, since I'm a warship and all...
Me, a soldier? Mmm, well, I guess 'sailor' isn't right either...
Eh, but I thought you were Nayru. So you're an Abyssal after all!
Veran? Is that who not-Nayru was?
Oh, Pit, are those wings? Can you fly?
It must be so cool to be able to fly around in the air!
All of our aircraft is flown by fairy pilot crews. They're all really good at flying! Maybe you can teach each other some new tricks!
All of our aircraft is flown by fairy pilot crews. They're all really good at flying! Maybe you can can teach each other some new tricks!
Ehehe, sorry about that, Rinkah. You look and sound like Musashi, but I guess you don't have the smell of motor oil or gunpowder on you.
Ah, mm, do you think I can get refined fuels here? I mean, I can drink raw oil, but it makes my engines hurt a little.
Quirks are powers, right? In that case, it has to be that I'm the fastest!
Ochako? Okay! I can do that!
Hm hm~. I'd say destroyers are pretty nifty, too, Ryuji.
Not just any torpedos, either, but type 83 oxygen torpedos. Destroyers are small, but we pack enough punch to sink a battleship, y'know?
I've raced the other destroyer girls into the docks- er, baths- plenty of times before! I'll be stripped before you know it!
Sailing races, running races, eating races, I'm good at all kinds of races! A strip race is easy!
I'm super quick at changing equipment! If it's a race to take it all off, I won't lose!
It's a race to strip off, but with cards? It's okay, I know how to play cards!
A game where you strip? I get it! I'll have my clothes off in a flash!
Eh!? Uh, I, definitely hope not. Having to sit around in the docks for repairs is so bo--
Yeah! Destroyer of the Imperial Japanese Navy, Shimakaze! That's me!
That's Rensouhou-chan, my naval gun! I'd say more about him, but-
I'm the fastest, you know? There's no way I'd ever want to slow down.
Of course I'm gonna be quick. Destroyers can go the fastest at the start of a sortie!
You want me to slow down? No way! I'm as quick as an island breeze, so of course I'm going to go fast!
Hmhm. What, are you jealous of how quick I can go, Meia?
I'm not a soldier; I'm a warship! I'm part of the Navy!
Of course I don't look like a soldier! I'm a warship!
Tsukumogami? Mmm, I'm similar to one, yeah! I used to serve the Emperor in the Imperial Navy!
Oh, yeah! Your last name is Katsuragi! Woaaah!
You definitely sound like an Abyssal. They're always going on about stuff like despair and suffering...
Not a battleship, Palutena, a destroyer! Those are completely different ships!
Not a battleship, a destroyer! You're close enough though!
I dunno who "Chat" is, but, okay, go on.
Eh? Slow!? Who said that!?
Well, naval codes have been drilled into me from training, so I'll usually get what you mean pretty quickly.
Uh, you're welcome, Streaming-chan. I guess.
My weight? I'll have you know I displace only 3,330 tonnes. And that's at full load, too!
Uuu... It's Shimakaze! Shi-ma-ka-ze!
Not a battleship, a destroyer! Musashi over there is the battleship!
I came first, as expected! I'm pretty fast, you know?
Hehe, I bet you all can't believe just how fast I am.
When it comes to speed, I won't lose!
Looks like I'm first off the block!
I'll reach the finish line in no time!
I've raced the other destroyer girls into the docks- er, baths- plenty of times before! I'll be stripped before you know it!
Sailing races, running races, eating races, I'm good at all kinds of races! A strip race is easy!
I'm super quick at changing equipment! If it's a race to take it all off, I won't lose!
It's a race to strip off, but with cards? It's okay, I can do that!
A game where you strip? I get it! I'll have my clothes off in a flash!
This is the start of my incredible comeback!
Don't blink! I'll be caught up in a flash!
Finally, I've got my engines going!
Late off the block, but not too late to win!
T-this is just the one game where I'm not supposed to go fast, okay!?
Oh! It's time to get this race started!
Being in the middle of the pack is fine for now!
Yeah! Time to get going!
Finally! Now the race begins for real!
T-this is just the one game where I'm not supposed to go fast, okay!?
I came first, as expected! I'm pretty fast, you know?
Hehe, I bet you all can't believe just how fast I am.
When it comes to speed, I won't lose!
Looks like I'm first off the block!
I'll reach the finish line in no time!
T-this is just the one game where I'm not supposed to go fast, okay!?
A little bit of damage here and there, but I'm still fine!
No damage to anything vital. I can keep playing!
Just gotta wait for the damage control fairies to do their work.
I won't even need time in the docks to repair something like this.
If it's just this, Akashi will have me fixed up in no time.
It's pretty generous to call something like this a hit.
Mmm, I hate it when they use high explosive shells like this!
Fire support? Me? No way, 9S, only Admiral would be able to organise something like that!
Songbird? Who's that? They sound cool!
Well, yeah, of course! How else would you win a race?
Muuu... Exactly what I didn't want to happen!
Well, Jenetta, I'm not burning them. They sort of... burn by themselves?
You don't have to worry too much about these fires, Jura. They won't spread any further... I think.
It's okay, Jura. My repair teams will put these flames out before they can spread... probably.
Y-you might want to look away right now, Kyoko!
It's okay, Marinette, my repair teams will put the fires out by themselves.
Yeah, looks like my rigging caught alight. It's no big deal though.
It's okay. The fires will burn out eventually.
Yeah, looks like some of my rigging caught on fire. It'll burn out in a bit.
Agi? Eh? I don't exactly know what you mean, Ryuji...
E-eeh? Lilim? What the heck's a Lilim..?
That's a really weird question. Usually, only Akashi or Ooyodo ask me questions like that.
Well, even a destroyer like me won't sink from this kind of damage!
Ah! Uh, L-Leyte, huh... Leyte didn't really go all that well, did it? Okay, it went really badly, and we lost, and I sunk, and... and...
Headpats are kinda nice, ehehe... except when they mess with my communications!
...I can't believe you just used my name as setup for a bad joke.
There's no way that I'd be slow! Don't they know that I'm the flagship of the Shimakaze-class destroyers! I'm as fast as it gets!
Headpats are kinda nice, ehehe... except when they mess with my communications! You saw what happens to me when my communications are interrupted!
Quirks are those powers you mentioned, right? It'd have to be my speed then!
E-Even if you get ahead of me, I can still catch up!
I'll let you have this head start, to even up the odds.
Enjoy your time in the lead. They don't call me the fastest for nothing!
It won't take me long to catch up, y'know?
I might be behind, but I won't be for long!
I-I'm just getting started! I'll catch up!
9S, you sound like Admiral when you say that!
Admiral is always going on about how important 'reconnaissance' and 'spreadsheets' are, 9S. He'd agree with you!
Oh, I can feel it! Something amazing is about to happen!
Ah, it's Kamina's turn again! I can't wait to see more of that, uh, M-MANLY PASSION thing!
Oooh, you can't just leave me all excited like this!
Hmm... Ryuji...
Hey, uh, Ryuji? There's something I wanna ask you...
What kinda races do you do, Ryuji? Are you a long distance runner? Or, maybe...
So, are you into marathons and stuff, Ryuji? Or are you more of a... oh!
Or, well, I thought you were a runner, but...
Ah, actually, maybe I was a little too quick to jump to conclusions about you, Ryuji.
Uuu. I, the fastest, not taking off something first?
Don't think you're faster than me just because you took something off first!
I've raced the other destroyer girls into the docks- er, baths- plenty of times before! I'll be stripped before you know it!

It won't take me long to catch up, y'know?
I might be behind, but I won't be for long!
I-I'm just getting started! I'll catch up!
What? I thought they said no guns allowed! Let me go bring Rensouhou-chan back inside!
You're firing straight up?
Now that you mention it, I'm picking up something odd on my radar too, Cammy.
Hmm... I am picking up weird things on my radar as well, Cammy.
Hey, Cammy, who were those pe-
Oh, yeah, Cammy, I just wanted to ask about those people from bef-
Ah, wait, I know, Cammy! Those are those "shadaboo" people you were talking about.
No, wait, I got it! Those people from before were the ones you were looking for, from "shalaloo"!
Marinette, you like to design clothing, don't you? I'm sure Akashi would love to hear ideas for better armor designs!
You say 'Akuma' a lot, Marinette, but... what are you talking about?
Do you have a way of detecting bad guys, Marinette? You would need one if you want to be a hero, right?
Wait, hold on- Marinette? What's a "Tikki"?
If it's for you, Prin- Miko, then we can make a concession!
Misato, you said you fought aliens too, right?
Woah, Misato. You could drink a sailor under the table.
Jun'you and Ashigara are pretty good drinkers, but you're not so bad either, Misato.
Oh, Monika, are you gonna take off your-
Oh, a harp? Are you some kind of musician, Nayru?
Wait, yeah, you had a harp didn't you, Nayru?
Ah, right, Nayru! Didn't you say you were an oracle or something?
I think you mentioned before that you were an oracle, right, Nayru?
Oooh, if we had someone who could see the future at the base...
Being able to see the future sounds like it'd be really useful, actually.
Maybe... Nayru, did you have a past life before, like us shipgirls?
You know, Palutena, the way you dress reminds me of the statues I'd see at shrines.
So, uh, who's going to strip now? Remilia? Sakuya?
Anyway, Musashi, what are you doing here? Did Admiral grant you leave as well?
You look pretty tough, Rinkah! I wonder if you can beat Musashi in a fight?
Ah, Ochako! I have a question!
Hold on a second! Ochako! Can you explain something to me?
Ochako, you remind me of one of the ships at the base, Gamby!
Ah, wait, I know now! You're a lot like Gamby, one of the American ships from the base!
Uuu. I, the fastest, not taking off something first?
Don't think you're faster than me just because you took something off first!
I've raced the other destroyer girls into the docks- er, baths- plenty of times before! I'll be stripped before you know it!

I'm super quick at changing equipment! If it's a race to take it all off, I won't lose!
It's a race to strip off, but with cards? It's okay, I can do that!
A game where you strip? I get it! I'll have my clothes off in a flash!
Oh, woah, a photo finish! I didn't think I'd be seeing something like this today!
E-Even if you get ahead of me, I can still catch up!
I'll let you have this head start, to even up the odds.
Enjoy your time in the lead. They don't call me the fastest for nothing!

It's a race to strip off, but with cards? It's okay, I can do that!
A game where you strip? I get it! I'll have my clothes off in a flash!
You're so slow! Are you doing that on purpose?
Hey, stop stalling!
You can take your time speaking after we start the next round!
I'm not mad right now!
Your tactical visor... does that give you radar functions? Or adjust your firing angles?
If you're going to get all fired up about this, then I will too!
You don't look so good, actually. Are you a little out of shape?
When's the last time you did some serious training?
You better not be making fun of me just because I lost!
This round, I'll show you why they named me "Island Breeze"!
I'll end this round so quickly, you won't know what hit you!
A lot of my information systems rely on my antenna array. It'd be bad if they came down...
That... was... super cool!
B-burning! Fiery! Hot! Uh... Curry! Passion! OH!
You'll have to be in peak condition if you want to win a race against me, hehehe!
If you're in anything less than perfect shape, I'll leave you in the dust, y'know?
You're so slow! Are you doing that on purpose?
Hey, stop stalling!
You can take your time speaking after we start the next round!
I'm not mad right now!
Ah, who's that? Is that one of your friends?
Oh, uh, a newcomer? Are they a friend of yours, Cammy?
Oh, uh, they've come back again!
Ah, hello again, friends of Cammy!
Now that I get to look at you, Jenetta, those rabbit ears are really cute!
Are you some kind of rabbit, Jenetta? Rabbits are super cute!
Ah? You had a sword with you, Jura?
You're really adult, Jura! And really classy too, like a lady!
Ah! I got it! Jura, you remind me of Saratoga!
Ah, yeah, did you say you were a pilot or something, Jura?
Now that I think about it, the fairies at the base all look the same.
Oh, um, is that a camera, Mahiru?
One of the shipgirls, Aoba, is the closest thing we have to a photographer - she's actually a reporter, though.
Mmm, Marinette, I recognize your accent... Ah! You're French, right?
And Richelieu's always looking into the newest fashions and trends. I think you'd be good friends!
Aww, guess we can't.
I'd offer to help you, but we have our hands full with the Abyssals.
..? Hey, fairies, are our radars okay?
We don't have many musicians at the naval base… oh! Except Naka-chan!
I don't think any of the shipgirls at the base know how to play instruments... Well, there's Naka-chan, actually.
Can't say I know anything about what an oracle is. What do you do as an oracle, anyway?
Well, I was just thinking, I don't actually know what an oracle does.
Y'see, whenever we have to fight the Abyssals, we have to sorta... 'track' them, and the way that we do that...
Sailing out to fight the Abyssals is super rough. We have to find them before we can fight them, but...
Oh, wait! You're a maid..? Are you that "Belfast" I've heard about?
So you're a Goddess! Do you know Amaterasu? Oh, or his descendant, His Majesty the Emperor?
Woah, Palutena. You sure have a lot of accessories on! Some of the bigger battleships are like that too, now that I think about it.
Ah, uh, r-right, Remilia...-sama?
Caramel colored skin and abs of steel? You're not tricking me, "Rinkah".
Ash white hair and half your 'clothes' are binding tape? You're not tricking me, "Rinkah".
Now that I think about it, I should've known you weren't Musashi, Rinkah. You're not even wearing glasses!
How strong are you? Could you punch a shell through thirty centimetres of steel?
You know, one time, Akashi reconfigured Rensouhou-kun into a helmet I could wear.
There was this time where we turned Rensouhou-kun into a helmet like yours, Ochako.
Ah, Ochako! You're all... floaty!
Those stabilly things are gone now, and I can't see any engines on you. Or even wings! How do you fly around?
No engine, no wings, no stabby things... how are you still flying around like that?
You better not be making fun of me just because I lost!
This round, I'll show you why they named me "Island Breeze"!
I'll end this round so quickly, you won't know what hit you!
Mmm, okay, they didn't seem very friendly, actually.
Okay, maybe "friend" wasn't exactly the right word for that.
Except… they're actually different people this time!
Hold on, are they a different group of people from before?
I was designed - well, the second time around - after rabbits!
Rabbits are really fast, too! Are you a good runner?
Aww! If I knew I could bring in weapons, I could have let Rensouhou-chan play too!
One of the destroyers at the base is always going on about how she's a proper lady, but she's just a kid compared to you.
Saratoga's really tall, and really pretty, and really gentle, and really nice, and you're like that too!
I've never heard of a Vandread before, but that sounds kinda cool!
I know about what the vanguard is, but I don't know what a vandread is...
Do they ever change their clothes? Do you know, Kyu?
Oh, cool! Are you some kinda reporter or something?
Most of Aoba's photos go into the base's newspaper. How about your pictures, Mahiru?
Maybe you can teach me some French! Richelieu and Teste would be so surprised if I spoke it to them!
It'd be just like human clothing! Akashi can handle the materials and fitting too!
But... oh! I think I heard that there are some tankgirls out there! Maybe they could give you a hand!
Huh. Must've been a false reading.
She's an idol, so she's really good at singing, and dancing too!
She doesn't play any instruments, but she's a good singer and dancer. She's an idol, after all!
Woah, you can travel through time! Wah- that's amazing!
Time travel!? Oh, wow, that's super cool!
We kinda just sail around and hope we get there in the end, hehe. So, uh, don't suppose you can give us a hand some time?
It's just a lot of guess work, actually. Not the greatest way to do it, but we don't have any better ways. Think you could sign up for service, Nayru?
Mmm, well, actually... you're not English, and you don't look like a shipgirl at all...
Does it do anything for someone made out of steel, like me? Would it turn me into a human or something?
If you counted every single one of their AA emplacements... uwaaah, you'd be playing forever!
Eh, w-wait a second, Remilia-sama! Where did your hat go?
Mmm, now that I get a good look at you... Maybe, just maybe, you're not actually Musashi?
She looks really reliable with them on! Maybe you should try glasses, some time!
You'd have to do at least that to beat Musashi in a fight, Rinkah!
But he was kinda heavy! Not to mention, every time he fired, I got thrown way off balance.
But he got in the way of my comm tower, so I had a real hard time hearing orders and coordinating with the fleet. Almost crashed into Amatsukaze-nee!
That's... so cool! This is that 'Quirk' thing, right? Right!?
G-guh...rave...ti? Uh, um...
Ooh, yeah, gur... guravetti! That's, uh, super cool!
Uuu, I'm starting to fall way behind!
I really wish that this was a normal race!
The way you stand, the way you move...
There's something about you and your body... hmm...
Are you a sprinter!?
Do you do sprints!?
Uuu, I'm starting to fall way behind!
How do I keep losing? I don't get it!
I really wish that this was a normal race!
Am I... maybe... not..?
I've gotta be doing something wrong. I'm supposed to be the fastest!
Am I missing something? A special rule or something?
This game is getting less fun!
W-wait, Kamina, where was the yelling? The cool catchphrase? The manly kick?
I can tell - you're a runner, aren't you!
There's no doubt about it - you're definitely an athlete!
We should have a race some time!
You and me should have a race after this!
Uuu, I'm starting to fall way behind!
I really wish that this was a normal race!
Ahaha, Aimee, are you doing that trick again?
This is so cool! Super cool!
Elizabeth, your jacket is almost the same blue as my armor! I love blue!
D-die? Wait, no, don't do that then!
Oh, uh, I just remembered, but you can't take too many pictures of me!
Heeh, so, they turn people into bad guys? How does that work?
Armor's for slowpokes after all, 9S! The best defence is to just never get hit!
As expected of Prince Sho- no, Miko! She can even make ghosts out of thin air!
... Monika, you say a lot of weird things, you know?
Now that I think about it, your name is Nugi-chan...
Oh! Hey, Palutena! You know, some of the shipgirls think that we're spirits of old warships!
That's some really strange armor design. Where's your other stocking, Palutena?
Those, um, stabilizey things, what do they do?
Hey Ochako, what are those orb things? Those are some pretty weird accessories!
Uuu, I'm starting to fall way behind!
How do I keep losing? I don't get it!
I really wish that this was a normal race!
Am I... maybe... not..?
I've gotta be doing something wrong. I'm supposed to be the fastest!
Am I missing something? A special rule or something?
This game is getting less fun!
You're so accurate, Aimee!
It only takes off what you want it to! Every time! Woah!
Yeah, damage control is super important for us shipgirls too!
Quick damage control can be the difference between an early retreat and a successful mission, after all!
Ah, your hands are... humans can't really fix things like that easily, can they?
Jokes about dying are not okay!
Hey, stop making fun of me! Especially when it comes to dying!
Admiral says you can get into a lot of trouble if you reveal 'military secrets', and I wouldn't want you to get in trouble!
Possessed... bad emotions... wait, that sounds a lot like the Abyssals...
Japan's Imperial Family really have descended from Amaterasu, haven't they?
Eh, no way, scars are cool! Since us shipgirls repair so easily, we don't get any battle scars to show off or anything!
I don't know what you're even saying sometimes!
"Nugi-chan" might sound like "Nelson", but it's not even close to "Belfast", huh? Ehehe...
You're a Goddess, right? Can you see spirits? Do you see anything interesting when you look at me?
Oh, so they help you fly! Akashi would probably be super interested in putting those on our aircraft!
I think our pilots would be super excited about putting things that help them fly on their aircraft! I'm gonna tell Akashi about them!
Uuu, ~name~'s slipping even further away!
~name~ already has a huge lead, but now they're gonna be even lighter!
Eh, what the-! ~name~'s lead just keeps on increasing!
I'm tired of losing all the time! I wanna start the race already!
This game has hardly started! I just have to find a way to catch up!
Mmm-! Where's my spirit? I can't lose!
I'm not gonna let anyone beat me! I'll prove that I'm the fastest!
Doesn't matter what kind of head start you have! I'll catch up in a flash!
I haven't even shown you my top speed yet! Just you wait!

How strong are you? Could you punch a shell through thirty centimetres of steel?

Ah, Ochako! You're all... floaty!

A girl who seemed prone to being attacked by enemies? Well, we know how that feels, don't we?
A man who... races for a living? Wow! Do you think he'd race me later on?

A lady who could kick really high up in the air? Humans really are flexible, huh?
A girl walking around hiding an axe... where? How..?
A girl... who is also a boy? But she's not the same as the boy..? Rensouhou-chan, that doesn't make sense.
A boy... who is also a girl? But he's not the same as the girl..? Rensouhou-chan, that doesn't make sense.

A really cool guy who kept following girls around? I don't really like the rearguard position, but it is important, after all!

A noble looking lady who tried to... kidnap you!? Muu, I can't have anyone stealing you away!

A really big fairy? Ohhh, that sounds cool! Is she an aviation fairy too?
A lady who sneezed a lot? And her hair changed color every time? She must use up a lot of paint!
A lady who says she's really quick when she's on a horse? I'd love to race a horse some day!
